=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Stock market holidays: NSE, BSE to remain closed on these days in 2026; check full list here
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 07:32
Related Stocks: RELIANCE
Categories: markets

Summary:
According to the holiday calendar, March has the highest number of market holidays with three, followed by April and May, which have two holidays each.

Sentiment: neutral
